eventScripts.script:
if currentValue.value == 0 or currentValue.value == 15 or currentValue.value == 30 or currentValue.value == 45:
		nowtime = system.date.now()
		starttime = system.date.addMinutes(system.date.now(),-15)
		readmypath = system.tag.readBlocking(["[.]../Production/Powertagpath"],1000)
		mypath = readmypath[0].value
		AvgPowerArray =  system.tag.queryTagHistory(paths=[mypath], startDate=starttime, endDate=nowtime, returnSize=1, aggregationMode="Average")
		AvgPower = AvgPowerArray.getValueAt(0,1)
		system.tag.writeBlocking(["[.]Power15minAverage"], AvgPower)
		if currentValue.value == 0 or currentValue.value == 30:
			starttime = system.date.addMinutes(system.date.now(),-30)
			AvgPowerArray =  system.tag.queryTagHistory(paths=[mypath], startDate=starttime, endDate=nowtime, returnSize=1, aggregationMode="Average")
			AvgPower = AvgPowerArray.getValueAt(0,1)
			system.tag.writeBlocking(["[.]Power30minAverage"], AvgPower)
			if currentValue.value == 0:
				starttime = system.date.addMinutes(system.date.now(),-60)
				AvgPowerArray =  system.tag.queryTagHistory(paths=[mypath], startDate=starttime, endDate=nowtime, returnSize=1, aggregationMode="Average")
				AvgPower = AvgPowerArray.getValueAt(0,1)
				system.tag.writeBlocking(["[.]PowerhourAverage"], AvgPower)

nowtime = system.date.now()
	starttime = system.tag.readBlocking(["[.]ProductionStartDatetime"],1000)[0].value
	delaytime = int(system.tag.readBlocking("[.]MachineOffMinSec",1000)[0].value)
	mypath = system.tag.readBlocking(["[.]Powertagpath"],1000)[0].value
	endtime = system.date.addSeconds(nowtime, -1*delaytime)
	seconds = system.date.secondsBetween(starttime,endtime)
	AvgPowerArray =  system.tag.queryTagHistory(paths=[mypath], startDate=starttime, endDate=endtime, returnSize=1, aggregationMode="Average")
	AvgPower = AvgPowerArray.getValueAt(0,1)
	system.tag.writeBlocking("[.]Production Avg Power", AvgPower)
	system.tag.writeBlocking("[.]Production Time", seconds)
	energy = AvgPower * seconds/3600
	system.tag.writeBlocking("[.]Production Energy", energy)
	system.tag.writeBlocking("[.]ProductionEndDatetime", endtime)

if currentValue.value == True:
		oldpartcount = system.tag.readBlocking("[.]PartCounter",1000)
		newpartcount = oldpartcount[0].value+1
		system.tag.writeBlocking("[.]PartCounter",newpartcount)
		system.tag.writeBlocking("[.]PartStartDatetime",currentValue.timestamp)
	else:
		partstartdatetimeread = system.tag.readBlocking(["[.]PartStartDatetime"],1000)
		partstartdatetime = partstartdatetimeread[0].value
		nowtime = system.date.now()
		seconds = system.date.secondsBetween(partstartdatetime,nowtime)
		readmypath = system.tag.readBlocking(["[.]Powertagpath"],1000)
		mypath = readmypath[0].value
		#mypath = "[ESN]Opto22/EdgeNodes/EMK1-0001/Loads/Compressor1/Data/Totals/Power/Total_TruePower"
		AvgPowerArray =  system.tag.queryTagHistory(paths=[mypath], startDate=partstartdatetime, endDate=nowtime, returnSize=1, aggregationMode="Average")
		AvgPower = AvgPowerArray.getValueAt(0,1)
		system.tag.writeBlocking(["[.]Part Avg Power"], AvgPower)
		energy = AvgPower * seconds/3600
		system.tag.writeBlocking(["[.]Part Energy"], energy)

tags.documentation: True when a part is being made, false when it is not.  Simply based on being above or below the part power threshold
tags.name: Part Boolean
tags.tooltip: True when a part is being made, false when it is not.  Simply based on being above or below the part power threshold

tags.documentation: Percent of total real power that is harmonic power.  Ignores any case where total real power is less than 1 kW.
tags.tooltip: Percent of Real power which is Harmonic. (ignores powers < 1kW)
tags.name: HarmonicPercentage

tags.documentation: Measures the percent above one third of the  total real power for each phase and then reports the maximum of those.  Ignores any case where total real power is less than 1 kW.
tags.tooltip: Maximum percent above average phase power of any one phase (when power > 1 kW)
tags.name: PhasePowerDeviationHigh

tags.documentation: Measures the percent below one third of the  total real power for each phase and then reports the maximum of those.  Ignores any case where total real power is less than 1 kW.
tags.tooltip: Maximum percent below average phase power of any one phase
tags.name: PhasePowerDeviationMin
